text: Mari'ama de putara isa ne aradasa kiti ki he alaha sade raba! Tu akasa vicom sade la'i ika thali utara, jihari sade la'i ika ida (simarati) bana ja'e ate sade agali'am la'i vi ate sade pichali'am la'i vi ate iha tere valom ika nisani hove. Ate sanu rizaka pradana kara. Ki'unki tu hi sabha tom vadhi'a rizaka dena vala hai
